TASK: Change homepage settings
DOMAIN: browser

STEPS:
1. Open Google Chrome browser
   REASONING: Need to launch the browser to access its settings where homepage configuration is located
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.98)

2. Wait for taskbar search or Start menu to appear
   REASONING: Allow time for the Windows interface to respond to the click
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

3. Type "Chrome" to search for the browser
   REASONING: Locate Google Chrome application through Windows search functionality
   ACTION: TYPE("Chrome")

4. Wait for search results to populate
   REASONING: Allow Windows search to find and display Chrome in the results
   ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

5. Click on Google Chrome from search results
   REASONING: Launch the browser application to access its settings
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.4)

6. Wait for Chrome to fully load
   REASONING: Ensure the browser window is completely loaded before proceeding
   ACTION: WAIT(2.0)

7. Click on the three-dot menu icon in the top-right corner
   REASONING: Access Chrome's main menu where Settings option is located
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.95, y=0.08)

8. Wait for menu to expand
   REASONING: Allow the dropdown menu to fully appear
   ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

9. Click on "Settings" option in the menu
   REASONING: Navigate to Chrome's settings page where homepage options are configured
   ACTION: CLICK(x=0.85, y=0.35)

10. Wait for Settings page to load
    REASONING: Ensure the settings interface is fully rendered
    ACTION: WAIT(1.5)

11. Scroll down to find "On startup" section
    REASONING: Homepage settings are located in the startup section of Chrome settings
    ACTION: SCROLL(direction="down")

12. Wait for scroll to complete
    REASONING: Allow the page to settle after scrolling
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

13. Click on "Open a specific page or set of pages" radio button
    REASONING: Select the option that allows customization of homepage/startup pages
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.1, y=0.55)

14. Click on "Add a new page" button
    REASONING: Begin the process of adding a custom homepage URL
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.3, y=0.6)

15. Wait for URL input dialog to appear
    REASONING: Allow the popup dialog for entering the homepage URL to display
    ACTION: WAIT(0.5)

16. Type the desired homepage URL
    REASONING: Specify the website that should open when Chrome starts
    ACTION: TYPE("https://www.google.com")

17. Click "Add" button to confirm the homepage
    REASONING: Save the entered URL as the new homepage
    ACTION: CLICK(x=0.5, y=0.65)

18. Wait for settings to save
    REASONING: Allow Chrome to apply and store the new homepage configuration
    ACTION: WAIT(1.0)

19. Mark task as complete
    REASONING: Homepage settings have been successfully changed and saved
    ACTION: DONE()

EXPECTED_OUTCOME: The browser's homepage settings should be successfully changed to open the specified URL (https://www.google.com) when Chrome starts. The "On startup" section in Chrome settings will display the configured homepage, and upon restarting Chrome, it will automatically open to the specified page.
